title: Descriptions: Color / Objects (Usefulness 3)
description: Traveler usefulness 3/10 phrases for the Color / Objects subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: I rode in a reddish purple car.
cards.romaji: Akamurasaki iro no kuruma ni norimashita.
cards.japanese: 赤紫色の車に乗りました。
